overview: When Lonnie Franklin Jr. was arrested in South Central Los Angeles in 2010 as the suspected murderer of a string of young black women, police hailed it as the culmination of 20 years of investigations. Four years later documentary filmmaker Nick Broomfield took his camera to the alleged killerâ€™s neighborhood for another view.
tagline: 25 years. Hundreds of victims. Justice for none.
title: Tales of the Grim Sleeper
